notes: Peak Dixit shredded mode. 240 g protein on <15 g carbs and only 37 g fat. Zero junk, zero added oil anywhere. Missed whey isolate and creatine today. Fasted weight dropping fast while strength is flying. Seafood demolished: 630 g edible portion at dinner alone. Streak continues.
